trend_summary: 1990–2020 imagery shows limited built-up growth. Small clusters of houses emerge along the east–west highway, yet built structures remain scattered. The dominant trend is farmland abandonment and progressive forest regrowth, shrinking light-toned fields. Minor new clearings and one quarry appear, balanced by overall greening. Road pattern is largely unchanged, confirming a stable, sparsely settled rural landscape.
notable_changes: Emergence of a few small residential clusters along the main east–west corridor
Numerous agricultural fields transition to forest, especially in the north and south
Overall woodland canopy expands, increasing vegetation density across the region
A light-toned quarry or industrial clearing appears near the central-southern area
Cultivated patchwork contracts, yielding a greener, more continuous landscape
